details: Learn the basics of Python programming, including syntax, data types, and control structures.
Master Java for web development, including servlets, JSP, and database integration.
Explore JavaScript for building interactive and responsive web applications.
Learn C++ programming and algorithmic problem-solving techniques.
Become a full-stack developer using the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack.
Create iOS apps using Swift, Apple's powerful programming language.

course_name: Data Structures and Algorithms in Python
details: Master data structures and algorithms in Python for efficient coding and problem-solving.
Build web applications quickly with Ruby on Rails framework.
Create 2D and 3D games using Unity game engine and C# programming.
